caption.p: Differential expression of HERVs in HCT8 WT/RETO, analyzed by real-time PCR. a: Amplification pattern of different HERVs in CD34 + mononuclear cells (MNC) from umbilical blood. The cells express all analyzed HERV variants. b: 18S endogenous control. c: Differential expression of HERV-WE 1 (2 −ΔΔCt 1.06). d: Degree of difference of HERV-FRD 1 (2 −ΔΔCt 1.72). Degree of difference of HERV-V 1 ( e, 2 −ΔΔCt 3.87) and HERV 3 1 ( f, 2 −ΔΔCt 1.80) transcripts in HCT8 WT/RETO. In HCT8 RETO, all HERV are overexpressed compared to HCT8 WT. Red, WT; green, RETO, n = 3 independent experiments
